{# errorcheck #} {% A: %} // ERROR `missing statement after label` {% A: ; %} // ERROR `unexpected semicolon, expecting for, switch or select` {% A: B: %} // ERROR `unexpected B, expecting for, switch or select` {% A: if true %}{% end %} // ERROR `unexpected if, expecting for, switch or select` {% A: if true %}{% end %} // ERROR `unexpected if, expecting for, switch or select`
